cause.description:
For as little as $3, with NO OBLIGATION, you can help sponsor a child! Dont' like the monthly high fees (usually $30 to $40 / mo) of child sponsorship? Can't make the payments but want to make a difference? Now you can! You can make a one-time payment for as little as $3 which will go towards child sponsorship! Go to: http://www.quik-mall.com/charities.aspx to make your donation!
1. All children are precious
2. It should not cost too much to make a difference!
cause.mission: Raise Funds to Help Sponsor Children
cause.name: Quik-Mall.com Charities
